Alloran is right about RID, and all the other things. Gobots was a rival
show, about the same, but it didnt have no where near the impact with
storyline, or creating a whole universe. Their toys were quite inferior,
and eventually Hasbro put them out of buisness, then bought the rights
to it. That's why for a while in Generation 2 they had characters named
Gobot, it was a shot in the face.

I would have liked to see the Beast Wars that the writers would have
made if they had total control and an unlimited budget. In my opinion
the guys who wrote that show were geniuses.

I like RID, but I am not to fond of how Anime it is. I'm not a big fan
of Japanese cartoons, and this one is no exeption, it dosent take itself
seriously. The animation is beautiful however, but the stories are not
very compeling. However I have read rumors that Takara or Hasbro (i'm
not sure which one is the owner) will make a brand new series soon
revolving around Generation 1, but this is just a rumor.
